Synopsis: Retrieves Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) settings for a specified computer.
Description: This function retrieves RDP settings for a specified computer using the Win32_TSGeneralSetting class.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Get-ComputerRDP -ComputerName "Computer01"
Retrieves RDP settings for a computer named "Computer01".

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Get-ComputerRDP -ComputerName "Computer02", "Computer03"
Retrieves RDP settings for multiple computers named "Computer02" and "Computer03".
